text: T-that felt really nice...
M-maybe I should do that more often...
That was nice...
M-maybe I need to do that more often! What do you think, ~player~? O-or, um, wait! Don't answer that!
Stripping isn't actually as embarrassing as you'd think, ~name~!
Ehehe~! I guess ~name~'s gotta strip now, hmmm?
Ooo, ~name~'s stripping, right?
Stripping isn't as embarassing as it seems, ~name~! A-and, um, you're cute, so don't worry!
Oh, ~name~'s stripping this time, right? I can't wait to see~
Ehehe~! ~name~ lost the round... I can't wait to see her strip~
Eeehhh? You couldn't take something bigger off, ~name~?
Eeehhh? You're seriously only taking your ~clothing~ off, ~name~?
Eh? You're only taking your ~clothing~ off?
Eh? really? That's all you're stripping, ~name~?
Aww... you're no fun, ~name~...
Aww... that's it? Really?
...on the other hand, I guess that means we're going to see some more later, ~name~...
Bu~ut, I guess we're going to see more later, ~name~?
Are you shy, ~name~?
Feeling shy, ~name~~?
A bit shy, hm~?
Getting a bit shy, hm ~name~?
Eehhhh? Your ~clothing~ looks super cool, ~name~!
Ehehe... your ~clothing~ looks really cool~!
Ehe... I think your clothing is really cool, ~name~! Where is it from?
Whoa... that... is really cool! Where's it from, ~name~?
Ehehe... I dunno why, but I think ~name~'s ~clothing~ looks super cool! Where is it from?
Ooooo... cool ~clothing~, ~name~!
Whoa, ~name~... your ~clothing~? ...Nice!
Whoa, ~name~... you're taking off your ~clothing~?
Oh, ~name~'s ~clothing~, huh... Ehehe~!
Whoawhoawhoa, wait, is ~name~ taking off his ~clothing~?
Eh? Is ~name~ really taking off his ~clothing~?
Waitwaitwait! I-Is ~name~ taking off her ~clothing~?
Ehehe~! I guess we're getting kind of a special view, right?
Ehehe... I guess we're getting a special view of ~name~, huh?
So, ~name~... how does it feel to be without your ~clothing~, hmmm~?
Ehehe... how does it feel to be without your ~clothing~, ~name~?
This isn't really what I was expecting from today... bu~ut I don't mind~!
I wasn't really expecting to see something like this, today... but I don't mind at all~!
Ehehe~! ~name~'s finally starting to run out of clothing, isn't he?
Ehehe~! ~name~'s getting close to losing, isn't he?
Ehehe~! ~name~'s getting down to the wire, isn't he?
Just a few more losses, ~name~~!
You look really well toned, ~name~! (...that's the word for it, right?)
Ehehe~! ~name~ definitely keeps in shape!
Ehehe... ~name~'s running out of clothing, right?
Ehehe... ~name~'s almost out, isn't she?
~name~'s running low on clothes, isn't she?
Whoa... your boobs are small!
Ehehe... you're flat-chested, like me!
Oh! It looks like we're flat-chest buddies!
Oh, you're a bit bigger than I am... but I'm fine with that~!
Hmm... I wonder if I could still grow a bit to be a bit more like you, ~name~...
Hmm.... you're just a bit bigger than I am, I think...
Whoa... they're huge, ~name~!
...They're so big!
Those are really big, ~name~! I'm pretty much a cutting board compared to that, ehehe...
You're almost done for, ~name~...
~name~'s about to lose, isn't she?
~name~'s almost done for, isn't she?
I-It feels like I should be embarassed, or something, but... um, since I already c-came in front of you all...
A part of me feels like it should be embarassed, or something, but... um, since I already schlicked in front of everyone...
...hmm... should I shave? Umm... what do you think, ~name~?
Ehehe... I tried trimming regularly, once. I kinda forgot to do it, after a while... though I guess you don't forget, ~name~.
Ehehe... I guess we both forget to trim down there, ~name~.
Um... I know there were a couple of rainclouds in the middle, but... um, that was actually really fun, ~player~!
That was really fun, ~player~, even if there were a few rainclouds in the middle!
So that was it, huh? ...Ehehe, that was a fun game!
